chatbot.evidence: The complaint mentions that there is only a chatbot available to attend to customers.
chatbot.description: The customer is complaining about the lack of human support and the inability to block their lost sim card.
chatbot.suggestion: Improve the chatbot by providing more accurate and helpful responses, and ensure that there is a way for customers to easily block lost or stolen sim cards.

complaint.description: The customer lost their phone and sim card, but despite making payments, their sim card is still active and being used by someone else. They contacted Telkom via Facebook to block the sim card, but it was not done.
complaint.suggestion: Telkom should take immediate action to block the sim card and investigate the unauthorized usage. They should also provide alternative methods of customer support, especially when physical stores are closed.

meta.review_content:
I have a Telkom contract and I unfortunately lost my phone as well as my simcard. However, I have been making payments as expected. 

I receive my statements every month via email. For a while now I noticed that my sim card is active and there is someone using it. I contacted Telkom via call but there is nobody to attend to customers, only a chatbot. 
I therefore contacted Telkom via Facebook at the beginning of February to try and block the sim card. 

Unfortunately Telkom didn't block the sim card but I noticed on my latest statement that the sim card is still being used meaning I am paying for someone else to use my sim card. 

This matter is worse because Telkom stores are closed around my area. This is such a major inconvenience
